text.tspan: -Move 1 metre in the range of attack
of the target without attack of
-If the attacker, roll 1 dice of damage.
-Lower the initiative of the target by 1.
can be spend to send the weapon
flying in a random direction. The
The target lose 1 spirit point per hit scored against them.
character to the ground. Can pinned
Subtract 1 die from every agility and
power dice pool or 1 bleeding wound
If a bleeding wound level 3 is
Make a resist shock test as a free
obtained on that test is the limit of
the dice pool for the next round. This
limit is increased by 1 on subsequent
Make a natural healing test. The
character die after a number of
minutes equals to the number of
MoSes on a resist shock step-back
rolling test (if made unconscious by a
bludgeoning weapon) or on a resist
An ally can try to re-animate the
static test or a medicine first-fail
rolling test with a difficulty level
equals to the number of minutes the
fatigue test with a difficulty level
chocked. On a failed, the character
piece of armour for all type
+1d is granted to a player allowed to perform an
Size Malus and Bonus for Range Attacks
Every time the range increment of a range weapon is
passed, 1 MoS is subtracted from the attack roll.
Acrobatics or Athleticism test to move
Must be at least at a distance equals to the movement speed.
Roll a running test, the unused MoSes can be added to the attack hits. Charge can not disarm.
The target is entitled to an attack of opportunity.
The MoSes from an melee combat can be saved until the start of the next turn and spend to oppose
Every MoS from an acrobatics test allow a character to move 1 metre by dodge rolling. Every metre
moved in this way subtract 1 MoS from every range attack made against the character.
Get up from prone with an acrobatics test. Every MoS reduced the movement needed by 1 metres.
Take 2 metres of movement to get prone, half movement to get up. Movement speed is halved.
Receive -2 MoSes on attacks (except for crossbow & firearms which receive +1 to the speciality).
Range attacks suffer a -1 MoS when targeting prone character and range increment malus is doubled.
Can reroll initiative either with reflex or perception & vigilance.
Must use the new initiative number, even if it is worse.
Can distribute amongst ally at hearing distance 1 spirit points per MoS on a Oratory & Poetry test.
For every MoS on an Insult & Intimidation, the target loses 2 spirit points. If the target of the
intimidation takes an aggressive action against the character, their dice pool is reduced by 1 for every
hits on the Insult & Intimidation roll. This malus is reduced by 1 on every round.
Intimidation function as a far range weapon with an range increment of 5 metres.
For every MoS on an Insult & Intimidation, the target loses 2 spirit points. If the target of the taunt any
actions other than an aggressive one towards the character, their dice pool is reduced by 1 per hit on
the Insult & Intimation roll. This malus is reduce by 1 per round.
Two or more characters with shield with the special hide behind shield can lock their shield together
and increase their shield defence by 1 for frontal attacks but cannot use the shield while flanked or
The characters can only move together, at the lowest initiative number but can attack at their regular
Small objects and weapons which can be more or less contained in one hand receive -1 MoS and
have a range increment of 5 metres.
Medium objects and weapons which are used with one hand receive -2 MoSes and have a range
Large objects and weapons which usually require two hands to use receive -3 MoSes and have a
If equipped with two one handed weapons, can make two attacks at the same initiative number.
The first attack receive -1 MoS, the second receive -2 MoSes.
